episode26.name: 25   Horns Down
episode26.description: The Hog Cast crew talks about Arkansas' dominating victory over Texas in  the Texas Bowl.
episode26.summary: On this very festive post-Texas Bowl Hogcast, the crew looks back on  the postseason contest against the hated Texas Longhorns. Why did the  win feel like more than a game for bragging rights? How can the win  help Arkansas moving into 2015? Why was everything Arkansas did so  right and Texas did so wrong? Colby, Chuck and Logan try to help you  with all of those questions and more.
episode26.keywords: Arkansas, Texas, Texas Bowl. Horns, Hogs, WPS, The Hog Cast, SEC, BIG 12
